test-case.description: Should include all test results in report

failure.message:
Expected regular expression 'ConfigurationStoreOperations' to match 'Configuration Manager Test Report Generated: 07/08/2025 23:15:53 Test Suite: Extended Duration: 00:00:00.0991275
SUMMARY ======= Total Tests: 7 Passed: 3 Failed: 4 Skipped: 0 Overall Result: Failed
DETAILED RESULTS =============== LegacyCompatibility ------------------- Result: Warning Details: {"CompatibilityLevel":"Partial","MissingModules":["ConfigurationCore","ConfigurationCarousel","ConfigurationRepository"],"AvailableModules":[]} Issues: Legacy modules not available: ConfigurationCore, ConfigurationCarousel, ConfigurationRepository Recommendations: Import legacy modules for full backward compatibility ConfigurationCarousel --------------------- Result: Failed Details: {} Issues: No configurations available in carousel ConfigurationStore ------------------ Result: Passed Details: {"Status":"All operations successful","OperationsTested":["Set","Get","Save","Load"]} RepositoryOperations -------------------- Result: Warning Details: {"Status":"Repository operations accessible","DefaultProvider":"filesystem","AvailableTemplates":[]} Issues: No repository templates available ModuleInitialization -------------------- Result: Passed Details: {"InitializationStatus":"Successfully initialized","ModuleVersion":"1.0.0","ConfigurationPath":"/home/codespace/.aitherzero/unified-config.json"} EventSystem ----------- Result: Warning Details: {"Subscriptions":0,"History":0,"EventSystem":"Available"} Issues: Event publishing function not available EnvironmentManagement --------------------- Result: Passed Details: {"Status":"All environment operations successful","OperationsTested":["Create","Switch","Remove"]} PERFORMANCE RESULTS ================== {} ISSUES SUMMARY ============= Legacy modules not available: ConfigurationCore, ConfigurationCarousel, ConfigurationRepository No configurations available in carousel No repository templates available Event publishing function not available RECOMMENDATIONS ============== Import legacy modules for full backward compatibility ', but it did not match.
